colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(ZHES BRJOD CING BSAM, DPAL MGON ZHAL BZHI PA LA MCHOD GTOR 'BUL TSUL 'DI NI RANG GI LAG GA-YOG BYED MKHAN PO BSTAN 'DZIN BZANG PO'I 'DOD MOS LTAR, PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYI GSUNG LA CUNG ZAD KHA BSKANGS TE, ^DHARMA BADZRA GIS DPAL MGON DGYES PA'I DUS TSES KHYAD PAR CAN LA SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
